text: Outrage is a movie that came out in 2010. Autoreiji is the movie's original title in Japan. Takeshi Kitano is the director. It has a restricted rating. It is 109 minutes long. It is a crime drama. It is about Tokyo's yakuza clans. It has a little sexual content. It competed for the Palme d'Or at the 2010 Cannes Film Festival. == Other websites == * Category:2010 drama movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Japanese-language movies
title: Outrage (movie)
